data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Norwich with the kick-off.
Todd Kane (QPR) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Norwich.
Oliver Langford blows to start the second-half. QPR with the kick-off.
Daniel Farke is making the team's first substitution at Carrow Road with Daniel Barden replacing Michael McGovern.
In the minute 70, QPR make their first substitution with Albert Adomah replacing Ilias Chair.
The away team have replaced Lyndon Dykes with Macauley Bonne. This is the second substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Dominic Ball is booked for the away team.
Penalty! Oliver Langford points to the spot, great chance for Norwich...
In the minute 74, Teemu Pukki smashes in a penalty at Carrow Road. The score is now 1-0.
Christoph Zimmermann (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
An attacking QPR player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 84, Bright Osayi-Samuel equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Norwich's Kenny McLean has been booked in Norwich.
In the minute 88, Tom Carroll is booked for the away team.
Jordan Hugill is replacing Jakob Lungi Sorensen for the home team.
Kieran Dowell is replacing Todd Cantwell for Norwich at Carrow Road.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Bright Osayi-Samuel (QPR) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
